title: Faker's spamming LeBlanc in ranked again
body:
Last time he spammed LeBlanc, someone acknowledged it and his response was

Q. (To Faker) How do you feel about achieving 12-0 on Leblanc.
Faker : It's because Leblanc is OP. I don't think it's because of me.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/33rvxc/fakers_response_to_his_120_leblanc_record/

And she currently holds the number 1 play rate in mid lane

Hmm....

replies.body: He was just being humble. Its like Messi saying he scores so many goals because ball is op and not because of his skills.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Im Atuko,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7vVpQdoU,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-13T01:58:45.810+0000)
>
> Last time he spammed LeBlanc, someone acknowledged it and his response was
> 
> Q. (To Faker) How do you feel about achieving 12-0 on Leblanc.
> Faker : It&#039;s because Leblanc is OP. I don&#039;t think it&#039;s because of me.
> 
> https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/33rvxc/fakers_response_to_his_120_leblanc_record/
> 
> And she currently holds the number 1 play rate in mid lane
> 
> Hmm....

And how is this affecting you, as a player, who does not play the game professionally?
Let us be blunt, the majority of the community is bad at the game and can't hold a candle to the pros.
Many champion weaknesses arent exploited properly because the community is quick to call things OP.
There is a reason LeBlanc is not pick or ban in the LCS or other communities.
She just isn't nearly as good as people who cry about her claim.

Yeah but LB is the ultimate derp champ.  When you can one shot ADCs by blowing your W and R just to get in range for the Q + E, somethings... kind of wrong.  

Then again, I watched a 2 kill fizz 100-0 an adc through exhaust in lcs last week, so assassins are healthy etc etc.
